title: The Intersection of Nanotechnology and Urban Agriculture: Applications of Carbon Dots
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00709C, Tutorial Review
Hanfeng Zhang, Yue Wang, Tiantian Zheng, Ting Li, Rui Gao, Wenzhe Liu, Qing Chi
Amidst the ongoing urbanization process, the significance of urban agriculture has garnered increasing attention. With the expansion of urban population, the urban landscape broadens, and agriculture becomes more commercialized, the...
